attributes.action: prevent the building of an incinerator at New England and find alternative solutions for our waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An EfW incinerator is not the answer to our waste problems. We want a zero waste policy. We want to recycle everything that is recyclable, and to change the packaging of items that cannot be recycled, so that they can be.
We want sustainable cost effective solutions to dealing with waste. We do not want an EfW incinerator.
